MemberSignature.Value: public static Windows.UI.Color CreateColor (System.Numerics.Vector4 hdrColor);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype Windows.UI.Color CreateColor(valuetype System.Numerics.Vector4 hdrColor) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateColor (hdrColor As Vector4) As Color
static member CreateColor : System.Numerics.Vector4 -> Windows.UI.Color

Docs.summary: Converts a Vector4 High Dynamic Range Color to Color object. Negative components of the Vector4 will be sanitized by taking the absolute value of the component. The HDR Color components should have value in the range between 0 and 1, inclusive. If they are more than 1, they will be clamped at 1. Vector4's X, Y, Z, W components match to Color's R, G, B, A components respectively.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Windows.UI.Color CreateColor (string colorString);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype Windows.UI.Color CreateColor(string colorString) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateColor (colorString As String) As Color
static member CreateColor : string -> Windows.UI.Color

Docs.param: Color string in Hexadecimal or HDR format
Docs.summary: Converts the color string in Hexadecimal or HDR color format to the corresponding Color object. The hexadecimal color string should be in #RRGGBB or #AARRGGBB format. The '#' character is optional. The HDR color string should be in R G B A format. (R, G, B & A should have value in the range between 0 and 1, inclusive)
